description:
The President is dead, but not from bleeding to death, as it first appears. He`s dead because the puddle of "blood" he`s in is actually red paint that he`d gotten on Mizuki`s painting.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bijutsubu Buchou Satsujin Jiken / Ii Ko Warui Ko Maigo no Ko / Love Letter Panic
Case of the Art Club President`s Murder / Good Child, Bad Child, Lost Child / Love Letter Panic
